archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Voorbereiden behandeling (wp)
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: <languages xml:space="preserve"><nl-NL>Pre-conditie: Behandelplan = dus inclusief geplande (behandel)activiteiten Post-conditie: Voorbereide behandeling (locatie, middelen, patient) </nl-NL><en-US>"Pre-condition: Treatment plan = including planned (treatment) activities Post-condition: Prepared treatment (location, resources, patient)" "Ensuring that the supplies are prepared, e.g. preparing medication for administration, ensuring that the correct nets are present in the OR, etc</en-US></languages>

properties.value: Pre-conditie: Behandelplan = dus inclusief geplande (behandel)activiteiten Post-conditie: Voorbereide behandeling (locatie, middelen, patient)

"Pre-condition: Treatment plan = including planned (treatment) activities Post-condition: Prepared treatment (location, resources, patient)" "Ensuring that the supplies are prepared, e.g. preparing medication for administration, ensuring that the correc
t nets are present in the OR, etc
